videos.title: KYLE - iSpy feat. Lil Yachty (2017)
videos.description: The "iSpy" music video by KYLE featuring Lil Yachty combines playful animation with live-action, creating a whimsical and colorful world that reflects the song's lighthearted vibe. It transports the viewer into a carefree, imaginative space where the artists, portrayed as children, explore vibrant, animated landscapes. This creative blend of elements highlights the song's themes of joy and escapism.
videos.additional_info:

This creative blend of elements highlights the song's themes of joy and escapism.

videos.alt_text: Dillon Francis, Good Times Ahead - LA On Acid
videos.title: Dillon Francis, Good Times Ahead - LA On Acid (2023)
videos.description: Dillon Francis, Good Times Ahead - LA On Acid (2023)
videos.additional_info:
Dillon Francis, Good Times Ahead - LA On Acid (2023)
A mesmerizing music video featuring a chaotic journey initiated by Diplo's spiked chicken nugget, showcasing wild camera angles, unusual characters, and intense visual effects set in a quirky vintage Chinese restaurant. Director Seaman's close collaboration with Francis ensures a deep connection with the song's rhythms and lyrics, bringing to life a vividly demented world that captivates viewers, with or without the influence of LSD.
Technique - Double Dolly , Epiphany , Surprise
Director - Parker Seaman
DOP - Franklin Ricart
Editor - Jacob Ehrlich
Colorist - Josh Bohoskey
Original Source - Link
